channel.title: Teams on Office 365 blog
channel.description: Recent content in Teams on Office 365 blog

item.title: Abusing Teams client protocol to bypass Teams security policies
item.description:
Administrators can use teams policies for controlling what users can do in Microsoft Teams.

In this blog, I’ll show that these policies are applied only in client and thus can be easily bypassed.

item.title: Technical deep dive to Microsoft Teams (free)
item.description: Microsoft Teams has been available for free since July 2018. In this blog, I’ll deep dive to its technical details.

item.title: Admin: Take back control of Office 365 Groups, Teams, and Planner!
item.description:
Office 365 groups is a great way to promote collaboration between people inside and outside organisations. By default, users are able to create groups freely, making their use easy. However, in many organisations, this has led to chaos.

In this blog, I show how you can get back the control of Office 365 groups, Teams and Planner.
